title: Kataina coaching help needed ( Evariste92 ) OCE realms
body:
I'm very new to the game played for 4 months. I only reason only found out Katarina is my favourite hero and I really wanna get good with her cause its all I play. I'm very passionate about wanting to learn Katarina. I have watched videos and stuff I know the combos I just have trouble executing them at the correct times I'm really reaching out here I wanna play her in ranked and stuff and really learn If you can help me I'm on the OCE realms name is Evariste92 please contact me cause I really want to improve my  game play with Katarina


Evariste92

replies.body: hey buddy. add burstfire305. i do free coaching
